databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarTermsQuery: select word2, count from $tableSimilarTerms where word1=? order by count desc
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarTermsTopQuery: select word2, count from $tableSimilarTerms where word1=? order by count desc LIMIT 0, $numberOfEntries
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarTermsGtScoreQuery: select word2, count from $tableSimilarTerms where word1=? and count>? ORDER BY count DESC
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarTermScoreQuery: select SIM from $tableSimilarTerms where word1=? and word2=?
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarContextsQuery: SELECT feature2,count FROM $tableSimilarContexts WHERE feature1 = ? ORDER BY count desc
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.similarContextsTopQuery: SELECT feature2,count FROM $tableSimilarContexts WHERE feature1 = ? ORDER BY count desc LIMIT 0, $numberOfEntries
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.termContextsCountQuery: SELECT count FROM $tableTermContextsScore WHERE word =? and feature = ?
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.termContextsScoreQuery: SELECT SIG FROM $tableTermContextsScore WHERE word =? and feature = ?
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.termContextsScoresQuery: SELECT feature, SIG, count FROM $tableTermContextsScore WHERE word =? ORDER BY SIG desc
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.termContextsScoresTopQuery: SELECT feature, SIG, count FROM $tableTermContextsScore WHERE word =? ORDER BY SIG desc limit 0, $numberOfEntries
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.termContextsScoresGtScoreQuery: SELECT feature, SIG, count FROM $tableTermContextsScore WHERE word =? and SIG > ? ORDER BY SIG desc
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.sensesQuery: select cid,cluster, isas from $tableSenses where word=?
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.senseCUIsQuery: SELECT CID, CUIS_1 FROM $tableSenseCUIs where w_match=?
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.isasQuery: SELECT CID, ISAS FROM $tableIsas where w_match=?
databaseThesaurusConfiguration.isTermContained: select W.word FROM $tableTermCount W left JOIN $tableSimilarTerms S on W.word = S.word1 LEFT JOIN $tableTermContextsScore F ON W.word = F.word where W.word in (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) GROUP BY W.word
